name: React.js
desc: to render the document that you're seeing right now.

name: React Router
desc: to make dashboard point to this page.

name: React Hook Forms
desc: to avoid reimplementing form validation and state logic.

name: MaterialUI
desc: to be able to use those beautiful animated buttons and inputs.

name: Javascript fetch api
desc: to request authentication to the backend.

name: Session, Local, and Cookie Storage
desc: to make the page remember you.

name: Java 11 + SpringBoot + Gradle
desc: to implement the backend authentication service.

name: Json Web Tokens(JWT)
desc: to indicate the backend what you can and can't access.

name: Spring Security Cryptographic Library
desc: to make the storage of your password extra secure.

name: Google Cloud's App Engine.
desc: to host and run the backend service.

name: Google Cloud's https tools
desc: so no one can see yout password while it's traveling.

name: Git
desc: to version control the application's code.

name: Coming Soon ...
desc: Log in/Register via Google account using Oauth2!
